Requirement: All processing must have lawful basis
Implementation: Legal basis tracked in gdpr_metadata table (consent, contract, legal_obligation, vital_interests, public_task, legitimate_interests)

Requirement: Data only used for stated purposes
Implementation: Purpose field in gdpr_metadata tracks intended use

Requirement: Delete data when no longer needed

Implementation: Standard CRUD operations with audit trail
Consent withdrawal tracked in consents table
Incident response plan with breach notification
Consents table tracks consent with audit trail
AI scores include confidence + human override
Retention by classification: PUBLIC(7y), INTERNAL(3y), CONFIDENTIAL(10y), PRIVILEGED(permanent)
anonymize_record() replaces PII with anonymized values

Requirement: Log all data access and changes
